name: Care of elderly and of disabled adults
description: Under Health and Welfare / Welfare, this field is the study of non-medical care for elderly individuals and disabled adults, focusing on their daily living needs and well-being.

name: Care of the elderly
description: Providing non-medical support and assistance to older adults to help them with daily activities and maintain their quality of life, a core part of Care of elderly and of disabled adults.

name: Non-medical care of disabled adults
description: Assisting adults with disabilities in their daily living, focusing on personal care and support rather than medical treatment, within Care of elderly and of disabled adults.

name: Personal care of adults
description: Providing assistance with personal hygiene, mobility, and other daily tasks for adults who require support, including the elderly and disabled, as part of Care of elderly and of disabled adults.
